entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Chesterfield
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:41 PM CST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Sunny, -35.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chesterfield Inlet Airport 3:00 PM CST Saturday 28 January 2023
Condition: Mainly Sunny
Temperature: -35.8°C

Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 67 %

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 38 with temperature rising to minus 34 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 30 km/h. Low minus 38 with temperature rising to minus 34 by morning. Wind chill minus 55 this evening and minus 48 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 31.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind west 30 km/h. High minus 31. Wind chill near minus 48. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 32. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind west 30 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 32. Wind chill near minus 50. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Saturday 28 January 2023
